item.title: 康菲石油公司及其合作伙伴将投资20亿美元开发大埃科菲斯克油田天然气及凝析油项目
item.description: 康菲石油及其合作伙伴将投资约200亿挪威克朗（合21.1亿美元），计划于2028年底前重启大埃科菲斯克地区三个油田的生产。该计划于周五提交挪威政府。【原文：ConocoPhillips and its partners will invest some 20 billion Norwegian crowns ($2.11 billion) to restart production at three fields in the Greater Ekofisk area by the end of 2028, plans presented to the Norwegian government showed on Friday.】

item.title: 欧莱雅因销售额略低于预期，股价预计下跌5%-7%
item.description: 交易员预计欧莱雅股价周五开盘将下跌5%至7%，此前这家法国美妆巨头公布的第四季度销售额略低于分析师预期。【原文：Traders called L'Oreal shares to open between 5% and 7% lower on Friday, after the French beauty major's fourth-quarter sales slightly missed analysts' forecasts.】

item.title: 土耳其在OnlyFans调查中拘留16人，查扣690万美元资产
item.description: 土耳其检察官称，该国周五在调查OnlyFans平台内容相关的洗钱指控时，拘留了16人并查扣了价值约3亿里拉（合690万美元）的资产。【原文：Turkey detained 16 people and seized assets worth about 300 million lira ($6.9 million) on Friday in an investigation into alleged money laundering linked to content shared on the OnlyFans platform, prosecutors said.】

item.title: 德国《经理人》杂志报道，Stark公司在本轮融资中估值超过10亿欧元
item.description: 据《经理人杂志》周五报道，德国初创企业兼无人机制造商Stark Defence数周前获得投资者新一轮融资，公司整体估值已突破10亿欧元（约合12亿美元）。【原文：Stark Defence took on new funding from investors a few weeks ago, increasing the overall value of the German startup firm and drone maker to more than 1 billion euros ($1.2 billion), Manager Magazin reported on Friday.】

item.title: 法国支持的欧卫通信公司报告称，在推动Starlink项目过程中收入有所增长
item.description: 欧洲卫星通信公司周五公布的营收超出预期，这得益于法国政府推动建立欧洲版"星链"卫星网络的计划，该计划旨在与埃隆·马斯克的"星链"卫星网络竞争。随着该公司转向专注于互联网服务，这一举措为其注入了新的动力。【原文：Eutelsat on Friday reported better-than-expected revenue, bolstered by efforts from France to advance plans for a European competitor to Elon Musk's Starlink, boosting the satellite operator as it pivots to focus on internet services.】

item.title: 凯捷集团超额完成营收目标，人工智能业务订单持续增长
item.description: 法国IT服务集团凯捷周五公布的全年营收超出自身预期，这得益于第四季度加速增长——其新收购的WNS部门推动了人工智能驱动的业务流程服务需求。【原文：French IT services group Capgemini on Friday reported full-year revenue that beat its own target, driven by accelerating growth in the fourth quarter as its recently bought WNS unit fuelled demand for AI-powered business process services.】

item.title: 赛峰集团2026年利润目标上调，得益于喷气发动机服务业务蓬勃发展
item.description: 法国航空航天集团赛峰集团周五预测，2026年其营收和利润将实现增长。此前该集团去年在民用喷气发动机售后市场需求强劲的推动下，盈利能力显著提升。【原文：French aerospace group Safran forecast increased revenue and earnings for 2026 on Friday, after boosting profitability last year on the back of strong aftermarket demand for its civil jet engines.】

item.title: 赛诺菲新任首席执行官需整顿药物研发管线并应对特朗普政府
item.description: 赛诺菲即将上任的首席执行官、65岁的贝伦·加里霍面临重大任务：她需要赢得投资者信任，加速这家法国制药企业停滞的药物研发进程，并在特朗普总统治下的美国应对民众对疫苗的质疑。【原文：Sanofi's incoming CEO, 65-year-old Belén Garijo, faces a major task to win over investors, accelerate the French company's stalled drug development pipeline and navigate vaccine scepticism in the United States under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：不再是他们的心头好
item.description: 欧洲及全球市场今日展望——由邱思妤为您解读【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 《金融时报》报道称，特朗普计划取消部分金属和铝制品的关税。
item.description: 《金融时报》周五援引知情人士消息报道称，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普正计划降低部分钢铁和铝制品的关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is planning to scale back some tariffs on steel and aluminium goods, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 年初价格上涨推动美国1月月度消费者通胀率攀升
item.description: 美国1月份消费者价格涨幅可能保持稳定，因企业年初纷纷提价，加之劳动力市场趋稳，美联储或将维持利率不变一段时间。【原文：U.S. consumer prices likely maintained a steady pace of increase in January as businesses raised prices at the start of the year, which together with a stabilizing labor market could allow the Federal Reserve to keep interest rates unchanged for a while.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，DayOne Data正筹备50亿美元美国IPO，多家银行参与承销
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士消息报道称，DayOne数据中心公司已选定银行为其筹备美国首次公开募股（IPO），该次募股可能筹集约50亿美元资金。【原文：DayOne Data Centers has selected banks to prepare for a U.S. initial public offering that could raise about $5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行私人银行计划在新兴市场扩大招聘规模
item.description: 德意志银行计划今年在其新兴市场私人银行部门增聘多达50名客户经理，一位高管表示。这家欧洲银行正寻求扩大其在海湾地区和北亚地区的财富管理业务版图。【原文：Deutsche Bank plans to add up to 50 relationship managers in its emerging markets private banking unit this year, said a senior executive, as the European lender seeks to bolster its wealth footprint in the Gulf region and North Asia.】

item.title: 台湾企业自主决定对美投资，总统表示
item.description: 赖清德周五表示，台湾承诺对美国投资的2500亿美元资金具体投向由企业自行决定，但其最大生产能力仍将留在本土。【原文：It is up to companies to decide where best to spend the $250 billion Taiwan has pledged in investments in the United States but their largest production capacity will remain at home, President Lai Ching-te said on Friday.】

item.title: 通用电气航空公司借助机器人和精益方法应对喷气发动机维修压力
item.description: 通用电气航空技术员苏雷什·辛奈扬十多年来一直从事喷气发动机压缩机叶片的维修工作，他以娴熟的精准度引导叶片在砂带上进行打磨。【原文：GE Aerospace technician Suresh Sinnaiyan has spent more than a decade repairing jet‑engine compressor blades by guiding them across a sanding belt with practised precision.】

item.title: 油价本周料将下跌，因伊朗风险消退，供应过剩担忧加剧
item.description: 油价周五基本持平，此前一个交易日曾下跌，本周有望连续第二周下跌。市场对伊朗冲突可能影响供应的担忧有所缓解，且预测今年供应将超过需求。【原文：Oil prices were little changed on Friday after falling in the previous session, and are set for their second weekly decline, on receding concerns of an Iranian conflict that could affect supply and on forecasts supply will exceed demand this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市从历史高位回落，科技股再度引发担忧，债券市场则出现反弹。
item.description: 亚洲股市周五从历史高位回落，科技行业利润率萎缩的担忧冲击了苹果等公司，在关键美国通胀数据公布前，投资者纷纷涌向避险债券。【原文：Asian shares retreated from record highs on Friday as worries about shrinking margins in the tech sector hit the likes of Apple, driving investors into safe-haven bonds ahead of key U.S. inflation data.】

item.title: 高盛首席律师鲁姆勒在爱泼斯坦案披露后辞职
item.description: 高盛首席法律顾问凯西·鲁姆勒已辞职，首席执行官大卫·所罗门周四宣布。此前美国司法部上月公布的文件显示，鲁姆勒曾接受已故性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦的礼物，并就如何应对媒体对其犯罪行为的追问向其提供建议。【原文：Goldman Sachs general counsel Kathy Ruemmler has resigned, CEO David Solomon said on Thursday, after documents released by the U.S. Justice Department last month showed Ruemmler accepted gifts from late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and advised him on how to address media inquiries regarding his crimes.】

item.title: 日元有望创下近15个月来最佳单周表现
item.description: 日元周五有望创下近15个月来最佳周表现，此前日本首相高市早苗赢得历史性选举胜利，缓解了投资者对该国财政状况的担忧，日元汇率由此持续攀升。【原文：The yen was set for its best week in almost 15 months on Friday, having climbed steadily after Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi's historic election win allayed investor worries about the nation's fiscal health.】

item.title: 美国法院叫停合并披露规则扩容
item.description: 德克萨斯州一名美国联邦法官周四叫停了一项扩大企业合并审查信息提交范围的规则，称该规则超出了联邦贸易委员会的职权范围。【原文：A U.S. federal judge in Texas on Thursday blocked a rule that expanded the amount of information companies have to turn over when seeking a merger review, saying it exceeded the Federal Trade Commission's authority.】

item.title: 埃利奥特重申反对丰田工业收购要约，股价创历史新高
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司周五表示，不会按当前条款将其持有的丰田工业股份提交至延长的要约收购中，并强烈建议其他股东效仿此举。【原文：Elliott Investment Management on Friday said it will not tender its Toyota Industries shares into an extended tender offer at current terms and strongly encouraged other shareholders to follow suit.】

item.title: 美联储政策比预期更紧缩，通胀并非问题，米兰表示
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰周四表示，美联储当前的货币政策立场威胁到美国经济增长，而该增长本应由特朗普政府包括减税在内的一系列政策提供支撑。他再次阐述了进一步降息的必要性。【原文：The Federal Reserve's current monetary-policy setting threatens U.S. economic growth that otherwise is being "underwritten" by a range of Trump administration policies including tax cuts, Fed Governor Stephen Miran said on Thursday as he again laid out the case for more interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，耐克旗下品牌匡威将调整业务布局并缩减企业员工规模。
item.description: 知情人士周四向路透社透露，耐克旗下品牌匡威正裁减企业职能岗位，以使其运营模式与母公司这家运动服饰巨头保持一致。【原文：Nike-owned Converse is cutting corporate roles as it aligns its operating model with its sportswear giant parent, a source familiar with the development told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 全球电动汽车销量受中国、美国一月放缓拖累
item.description: 咨询机构Benchmark Mineral Intelligence（BMI）周五发布的数据显示，受中国推出购置税政策及降低电动汽车补贴、美国政策调整等因素影响，1月份全球电动汽车注册量下降3%。【原文：Global EV registrations fell 3% in January as the introduction of a purchase tax and lower EV subsidies in China and policy changes in the U.S. hindered sales, data by consultancy Benchmark Mineral Intelligence (BMI) showed on Friday.】

item.title: 宾州州长称PJM将延长容量拍卖价格上限两年
item.description: 宾夕法尼亚州州长乔希·夏皮罗周四在X平台发文称，在该州采取法律行动后，电网运营商PJM互联公司已同意将其容量拍卖的价格上限再延长两年。【原文：Grid operator PJM Interconnection has agreed to extend a price cap on its capacity auctions for another two years following legal action by the state, Pennsylvania Governor Josh Shapiro said in a post on X on Thursday.】

item.title: 彭博社报道称，金融科技公司Clear Street推迟美国IPO计划
item.description: 彭博社周四报道，华尔街经纪商Clear Street已推迟其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的计划。这是本周第二家推迟上市的公司，表明IPO市场正面临新一轮波动。【原文：Wall Street broker Clear Street has postponed its U.S. initial public offering, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, marking the second delayed listing in a week as the IPO market faces another bout of volatility.】

item.title: 独家：萨克斯债权方与供应商正协商避免就破产贷款问题诉诸法庭
item.description: 知情人士透露，为避免法庭诉讼，谈判代表正争分夺秒解决一项争议：价值数百万美元的奢侈品手袋、服装和珠宝能否作为萨克斯百货公司17.5亿美元破产贷款的抵押品。【原文：Hoping to avert a court battle, negotiators are racing to resolve a dispute over whether millions of dollars in luxury handbags, clothing and jewelry could be claimed as collateral for Saks' $1.75 billion bankruptcy loan, people familiar with the talks said.】

item.title: 淡水河谷因镍资产减值录得38亿美元季度亏损
item.description: 巴西矿业巨头淡水河谷周四公布，其第四季度净亏损较2024年同期扩大，主要源于加拿大镍资产减值及税务影响。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale on Thursday reported that its fourth-quarter net loss widened versus the same period of 2024, citing an impairment of nickel assets in Canada and a tax effect.】

item.title: 泰勒·斯威夫特要求美国政府阻止"Swift Home"商标注册
item.description: 流行乐坛巨星泰勒·斯威夫特已向美国专利商标局提出申请，要求阻止某床上用品公司注册包含"Swift Home"字样的联邦商标，理由是该商标会误导消费者。【原文：Pop superstar Taylor Swift has asked the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office to block a bedding company from securing a federal trademark featuring the phrase "Swift Home," arguing it would confuse shoppers.】

item.title: 赌场运营商永利因拉斯维加斯业务疲软未达季度预期
item.description: 赌场运营商永利度假村周四公布的第四季度利润未达华尔街预期，其拉斯维加斯业务及其他地区物业的业绩疲软是主要原因。【原文：Casino operator Wynn Resorts missed Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt by weaker performance in its Las Vegas business and other regional properties.】
